metadata.title: CVE-2023-22656 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description: Out-of-bounds read in Intel Media SDK and some Intel oneVPL softwarebefore version 23.3.5 may allow an authenticated user to potentiallyenable escalation of privilege via local access.

criterions.comment: intel-mediasdk package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
